VUPShionMod:PlanedModify.NAME: Planed Modification
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade current #yFunnel by #b%d.

VUPShionMod:CorGladiiFragment.NAME: Fragment of Steel
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose to #yUpgrade #b%d #yAttacks in your deck.

VUPShionMod:WordFragment.NAME: Fragment of Prayer
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose to #yUpgrade #b%d #yPrayer cards in your deck.

VUPShionMod:EnergeticFragment.NAME: Fragment of Energy
DESCRIPTIONS: 获得 #b%d 层 #y构装翼盾充能 。

VUPShionMod:TimeFragment.NAME: Fragment of Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Enter an additional turn after this turn. NL End your turn.

VUPShionMod:FlashBang.NAME: Flash Bang
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStun ALL enemies.
#yStun ALL enemies for %d turns.

VUPShionMod:MinamiDepository.NAME: Minami's Inventory
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d potion slots. NL Obtain #b%d random potions.
Gain #b%d potion slots. NL Obtain #b%d random potions.

VUPShionMod:MinamiHand.NAME: Minami's Final Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a #yPower from the Power Pool. NL Add #b%d copies of the chosen card into your hand.
Choose a #yPower from the Power Pool. NL Add #b%d copies of the chosen card into your hand.

VUPShionMod:MinamiReserve.NAME: Minami's Reserve
DESCRIPTIONS: Obtain #b%d random Skills. NL They cost #b0 this combat and #yExhaust.

VUPShionMod:ShoppingVoucher.NAME: Voucher
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you would buy anything in the shop is for free. NL When you do, this potion is discarded.

VUPShionMod:WorldLeaf.NAME: World Leaf
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal HP to #b%d%% of Max HP.

VUPShionMod:Bento.NAME: Lunchbox
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b%d HP. NL Obtain #b%d potions.
Heal #b%d HP. NL Obtain #b%d potions.

VUPShionMod:HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove #yALL Curses. NL Heal #b%d HP.

VUPShionMod:Claymore.NAME: Claymore Mine
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you receive attack damage, deal #b%d damage back.

VUPShionMod:MagiaMagazine.NAME: Magia Magazine
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d [E] . Draw #b%d cards.

VUPShionMod:Cola.NAME: Cola
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yStrength , #yDexterity and [E] .

VUPShionMod:UAV.NAME: UAV
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%d #yWeak and #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:TransitionGenerator.NAME: Transition Generator
DESCRIPTIONS: You may ignore paths to choose the next room to travel to. NL When you do, this potion is discarded.
